macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Indexes Close Slightly Lower on Friday Amid Light Holiday Trading
items.summary: Major US indexes ended marginally down on December 26: S&P 500 fell less than 0.1% to 6,929.94, Dow Jones less than 0.1% to 48,710.97, Nasdaq 0.1% to 23,593.10, and Russell 2000 0.5% to 2,534.35. Weekly gains included S&P 500 up 1.4%, with year-to-date S&P 500 up 17.8%.

items.title: Target Shares Rise on Activist Investor Stake News
items.summary: Target's stock increased following reports of an activist investor taking a stake in the company. Trading volume remained light as many institutional investors were closed for the year.

items.title: Gold and Silver Prices Climb, Crude Oil Falls
items.summary: Gold and silver prices rose, with silver up nearly 8% due to supply constraints; U.S. crude oil declined 2.8% while Treasury yields stayed steady. Several international markets remained closed.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Global Crypto Market Cap Drops 1.19% to $2.95T Amid Mixed Trading
items.summary: Major cryptocurrencies traded mixed over the past 24 hours, with Bitcoin at $87,571 down 1.32% and outperformers like TRU up 37%, AT up 34%, and KAITO up 23%. Ethereum at $2,933 down 1.14%, XRP at $1.85 down 1.03%, while SOL saw a slight gain of 0.11%.

items.title: Bitcoin Whales Buy During Price Decline as Rebound Fades
items.summary: Bitcoin traded between $86,655 and $89,050, closing down 1.32% at $87,571, with whales accumulating amid the dip. XRP slipped to $1.86 despite ETF assets reaching $1.25B.

items.title: U.S. Crypto Regulation Shifts Toward SEC-CFTC Collaboration
items.summary: U.S. crypto policy sees movement toward collaboration between SEC and CFTC, highlighted in year-end reviews. Congress passed and the president signed the first major crypto legislation this year.

items.title: Crypto IPO Renaissance with Circle, Bullish, and Grayscale Successes
items.summary: 2025 IPOs from Circle ($1.05B), Bullish ($1.1B), and Grayscale's $100M filing signal institutional validation, driven by regulatory clarity like the GENIUS Act and $87B ETP inflows.

items.title: Ethereum TVL Predicted to Surge Tenfold by 2026; Bitcoin to $1.3M by 2035
items.summary: Sharplink CEO forecasts Ethereum's TVL to increase tenfold by 2026, while Bitwise CIO projects Bitcoin reaching $1.3 million by 2035. China's regulator unveils digital finance development plan.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Nintendo Updates Donkey Kong Bananza on Switch 2 and Launches eShop Sale
items.summary: Nintendo released a new update for Donkey Kong Bananza on the Switch 2 and started a major eShop sale in the US with recommended games. Bloober Team teased 'Project M' for Nintendo platforms, appealing to fans of horror titles like Resident Evil and Limbo.[1]

items.title: Vince Zampella, Co-Creator of Call of Duty, Passes Away at 55
items.summary: Vince Zampella, co-creator of Call of Duty, has died at age 55, leaving a significant legacy in the gaming industry.[1]

items.title: Valhalla Cup 1 Night Session Held for EA Sports FC 26
items.summary: The Valhalla Cup 1 night session took place on December 27, 2025, featuring competitive EA Sports FC 26 matches on PS5 with legendary difficulty and high-rated players.[3]

items.title: Granblue Fantasy Rolls Out New Year's Campaigns and Updates
items.summary: Granblue Fantasy launched Extra Drops (Water), New Year's Special campaign with rewards like daily roulette and crystals, plus new main story arc, raid series, and upcoming NY skins for Albert, Medusa, and Caim.[2]

items.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 4 Release Date Announced for March 2027
items.summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 4 is set to release in March 2027, with an event movie in the Sonic universe planned for December 22, 2028; discussions highlight popularity of characters like Silver.[4]

items.title: Sonic Racing CrossWorlds Features NiGHTS, Ai Ai, Tangle, and Whisper
items.summary: New characters NiGHTS, Ai Ai, Tangle, and Whisper are confirmed for Sonic: Racing CrossWorlds.[4]
